dashboard.hint: This page shows detailed information about the user's transactions. It includes payment details, the total amount contributed, attendance records, and the total amount received from various organizations to which the user belongs.

signin.hint: This page enables users to access the application by entering their email and password, followed by clicking the 'Login' button

selfpaymentereport.hint: Self Payment Report is a report Page used by a user to search for details of the payment he or she has made to the various organizations to which the user belongs.

registeruser.hint: The page is used to register User, Fill in the Form and click on regiser. A Validation Code will be sent into the user Email which will be used to activate the registration

forgotpassword.hint: Please enter your email address and click the submit button. A validation code will be sent to your email. A new page will appear with fields for the validation code and a new password. Enter the validation code you received and your new password, then click the submit button to complete your password change request

passwordchange.hint: Please enter the validation code you received in your email and your new password, confirm the new Password, then click the submit button to complete your password change request

userregistration.hint: Fill in the form and Click on register button, to register a new User. A code will be sent to the email supplied. Use the code to complete your registration.
userregistration.validationmsg: Enter the validation Code you received in your email, then click on submit button to complete the User registration

clientform.hint: Fill in the form and Click on Submit button to Create the a new Client.

organisationform.hint: This page is use to create, Edit and or view Organisation. Fill in the required Field and click on the approprate button.

userprofile.hint: Fill in the form and Click on Submit button to Update the User Profile.

client.hint: This Page displays the List of all the client registered by the user through which he or she can create a new client, edit or view an existing one.

organisation.hint: This Page displays the List of all the Organisation/Center registered by the user through which he or she can create a new Organisation/Center, edit or view an existing one.

attendance.hint: This Page is used by an organisation/center to record member's attendance. Search for the member you want to capture his or her attendance, then click on record attendance button by toggling to the scanning option, then scan the QR Code to record attendance

selfattendance.hint: This Page is begin used to record attendance. Click on the scan button to scan the QR Code to be able to record attendance or by toggling to the form option, then You can record attendance by selecting Client and oraganisation/Center and then click on Record Attendance Buttone

turnel.hint: This Page is  used to Turnel to the Organisation/Center where the User belongs to.

commissionsettings.hint: This Page is used by an Organisation/Centre to setup the commission rates of different commision levels

commission.hint: User uses this page to calculation commission to enable him or her know exact amount he is expecting from the Affilate/Estate Company

userqrcode.hint: This Page display the QR Code of the User. Scan the Code to retrieve the details of the User.

attendancereport.hint: Attendance Report Page is used by an Admin User to search for Members that attended a particular meeting by selecting the search criteria.

producttypeform.hint: The Page is used to create all the Products and Services the Organisation Provides.

producttype.hint: The Page list all the Products and Services the Organisation Provides from where you can create a new one or edit an existing one

producttypedefform.hint: The Page is used to create detail of the Products and Services the Organisation Provides which includes amount for the products or services

producttypedefinition.hint: The Page list details of all the Products and Services the Organisation Provides from where you can create a new one or edit an existing one

properties.hint: The page allows users to search for properties based on location, price, and the company or affiliate managing the property.

userpayment.hint: The page allows financial Secretary or an Accountant to record the payment of the members or staff of the organisation. You can either scan the User QR code to record the member's due or you can click on the toggle to capture individual member's account record.

testimonial.hint: The page is used to record the testimonies by a realtor or Agent for the success of his or her business.

changepassword.hint: Please enter the validation code you received in your email and your new password, confirm the new Password, then click the submit button to complete your password change request

upserupload.hint: This page is used to upload Users, Generate a CSV file in the following format: [lastName, firstName, middleName, email, phoneNmber, gender, date of Birth]

producttypedef.hint: The Page is List all the Products and Services the Organisation Provides

orgprofile.hint: This Page is used to edit the Information of an Organisation by an Administrator

paymenttypeform.hint: This Page is used to create, edit or view all types of Payment been paid in the Organisation

paymenttypedefform.hint: This Page is used to Define all the payments Types that is paid in organisation

orgpmtform.hint: This Page is used to configue all the Annually Payments of an Orgnisation/Center

useroutstandingform.hint: This Page is used to capture all the Members of the Organisation, their outstanding Debt

orgupload.hint: This page is used to upload Organisation/Centers, Generate a CSV file in the following format: ['organisationCode','name', 'website', 'address', 'radius', 'meetingDays', 'slogan', 'allowSeatAllocation','validateMeetingStartTime', 'reservedSeats', 'seatPrefix', 'seatSufix', 'countryCode','stateCode', 'countyCode', 'client']

productdefupload.hint: This page is used to upload Products/Services provided by a particular client and organisation, Generate a CSV file in the following format: ['productType','name',  'productCategory','description', 'address', 'landmark', 'imageUrl', 'videoUrl','subscriptionFormUrl', 'amount', 'measurement', 'dimension', 'countryCode','stateCode', 'countyCode']

integration.hint: This page is used to setup Organisation Integration accounts. Fill in the form as required and click on save to setup integration accounts with respect of payment channels

paymentdetails.hint: This page is used to view all the paymennt across the Organisation where the user belong and from there the user can proceed to making online payment.

selfpayment.hint: This page is used by a user to make his/her outstanding payment Transaction through the app. Select the Payment Items you want and you can equally change the payment amount. Then click on the Payment Channel you want to complete you payment

msgintegration.hint: This page is used to setup all the message channel the organisaion supports and also to buy the required units need to be used in sending message.

sendmsg.hint: This page is used by an Organisation/Center to send Message to all her Members and those that attended any of her previous meetings/Seminars.

msgingsetup.hint: This page is used by an Organisation/Center to configure the messages needed to be sending to people Periodically. eg. Birthday Message, Wedding Anniversary Message etc

useroutstandingpayment.hint: This page is used by an Organisation/Center to create the outstanding payment for all their members.
